result.name: ROBLOX 2016 - a theme to mimic 2016
result.description:
Based off of the Roblox in 2016 style but I partially fixed the robux icon so it doesn't show the red "X" anymore. Fixed some other things too. Requires Light mode on ROBLOX to be enabled
This user script is incompatible with Roblox dark mode. Please set it to light mode. Please see this GitHub issue for more details.
Check the GitHub Repo for fixes and more recent updates!
Create an issue on the GitHub page if there are any problems (e.g broken icons).
Most and pretty much all code from Ologist.
result.notes:
1.2.6 Release

This user script is incompatible with Roblox dark mode. Please set it to light mode. Please see this GitHub issue for more details.

Thanks for 80k installs on Userstyles!!!

Quick install | You'll get the most recent version of this release with patches and changes. Unreleased install | You'll get the most recent in-development version of this release.

Standard releases can be found at ROBLOX2016stylus/releases.

Hello, User(script)

HELLO, [USER] - I probably should have announced this a while ago, but I made a Userscript that brings back the Hello, User stuff on the home page. Go check it out! Works with and without the Roblox 2016 style.

Changes/Fixes 1.2.6

  • [game-card-info] Margin fix

Find a bug?

Head on over to the GitHub page and create an issue! There you'll also get faster updates and beta versions of the script! (It'll just be a commit under stylustheme.css). Known bugs could also be fixed in the beta; check out the beta information here.

Credit

Credit to Ologist for initially making this great user-style theme! Find the original style @ https://userstyles.org/styles/178105/roblox-in-2016. And to all of our contributors!
